publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3961 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modification of Schedule 4) Order 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modification of Schedule 4) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-3961 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modification of Schedule 4) Order 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modification of Schedule 4) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
